channel.description: Gordon Beeming - Father • Husband • Triathlete • SSW Solution Architect

item.title: SQL Prompt 6.4 Release
item.description: I used to highlight a bunch of text (a couple of statements) then press F5 to execute that statement. With this new release you are able to easily execute the current statement by pressing Shift + F5.
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)
